config.name: Core Methodology Foundations
config.description: Build foundation in core tutoring methodologies

sample_responses.prompt: [TUTORING_METHODOLOGY_TRAINING] [TUTORING_SCENARIO] Student asks: 'I don't understand this concept' (Variation 1)...
sample_responses.model_response: Certainly! When a student expresses confusion about a particular concept, it is essential to employ effective tutoring methodologies that facilitate understanding. Here are some pedagogical approaches...
